briefdescription.para: The maximum nesting level for JSON objects before a parsing error.

detaileddescription.para: This exists to prevent the cJSON parser from causing a stack overflow. The user may override this macro at build time (e.g. -DN_CJSON_NESTING_LIMIT=200) to increase or reduce the limit.

memberdef.name: JArrayForEach
memberdef.initializer: for(element = (array != NULL) ? (array)->child : NULL; element != NULL; element = element->next)

briefdescription.para: The core JSON object type used by note-c.

detaileddescription.para: When using note-c, treat this struct as opaque. You should never have to work directly with its members.

briefdescription.para: Parse the passed in C-string as JSON and return a J object representing it.

parameterdescription.para: The JSON object as a C-string.

simplesect.para: A J object or NULL on error (e.g. the string was invalid JSON).

briefdescription.para: Get the unformatted string representation of a J object.

detaileddescription.para: The string returned by this function is dynamically allocated and MUST be freed by the caller with JFree. Unformatted means that the minimum JSON string is produced, without any additional whitespace.

parameterdescription.para: The JSON object to get the unformatted string representation of.

simplesect.para: The string or NULL on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (J *item, char *buffer, const int length, const Jbool format)
memberdef.name: JPrintPreallocated

memberdef.argsstring: (J *item, char *buffer, const int length, const Jbool format)
memberdef.name: JPrintPreallocatedOmitEmpty

detaileddescription.para: To free the object, use JDelete.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-created object.

memberdef.argsstring: (const J *const a, const J *const b, const Jbool case_sensitive)
memberdef.name: JCompare

memberdef.argsstring: (J *const object, const char *const name, const Jbool boolean)
memberdef.name: JAddBoolToObject

briefdescription.para: Add a boolean field to a J object.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add the field to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-added boolean field or NULL on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (J *const object, const char *const name, const JNUMBER number)
memberdef.name: JAddNumberToObject

briefdescription.para: Add a number field to a J object.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add the field to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-added number field or NULL on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (J *const object, const char *const name, const JINTEGER integer)
memberdef.name: JAddIntToObject

memberdef.argsstring: (J *const object, const char *const name, const char *const string)
memberdef.name: JAddStringToObject

briefdescription.para: Add a string field to a J object.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add the field to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-added string field or NULL on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (J *const object, const char *const name, const char *const raw)
memberdef.name: JAddRawToObject

briefdescription.para: Add an object field to another J object.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add the field to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-added object field or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Add an array field to a J object.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add the field to.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly-added array field or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Dynamically allocate a block of memory of the given size.

detaileddescription.para: This is simply a wrapper around the memory allocation function provided by the user via NoteSetFn.

parameterdescription.para: The number of bytes to allocate.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the first byte of the allocated memory or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Free a block of dynamically allocated memory.

detaileddescription.para: This is simply a wrapper around the memory free function provided by the user via NoteSetFn.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the block of memory to free.

detaileddescription.para: Written by Ray Ozzie and Blues Inc. team.
Portions Copyright (c) 2019 Blues Inc. MIT License. Use of this source code is governed by licenses granted by the copyright holder including that found in the LICENSE file.

MODIFIED for use in notecard primarily by altering default memory allocator and by renaming the functions so that they won't conflict with a developer's own decision to incorporate the actual production cJSON into their own app. In no way shall this interfere with a production cJSON.
Renaming was done as follows: CJSON_ -> N_CJSON_ cJSON_ -> J cJSON -> J
